Original:
專賣世界各地廠商的精釀啤酒酒吧！OKAY我是一個喝啤酒很容易醉的人，所以其實我去不是為了喝啤酒，是為了吃裡面的咖哩飯，以這個價位來看，真的是無比超級的好吃！140元，深夜吃到好吃的咖哩飯！而這咖哩飯全來自於一位調酒師，她很年輕、有個性，愛好挑戰，是個很帥很酷的妹子，但是先講一下，她已婚囉！她身上有很多刺青，也發生了很多故事，其中我想提出來探討的是被害者與加害人在輿論上一個有趣的現象，不知道從甚麼時候開始，台灣普遍有著一種習慣：跟風。大部分的人會依造表面的故事或片面的跟風行為就下定論去言語或肢體譴責加害者並安慰被害者，但這是對的嗎？有許多被害者實際上才是加害者，而加害者只是忍無可忍的反擊。也有許多加害者已經提前向被害者訴說了自己未來會做的行為舉止，而被害者還是不管自身安全的靠近他，這樣子被害者受害了真的有那麼需要被安慰嗎？我個人覺得自己做的選擇要自己可以去負責才是真正的大人，如果還是小朋友心理，那一開始就不該去接觸，另外輿論又是另一個真正的加害者，他會侵蝕人的內心，所以應該要完全了解事情的始末與動機後再發出言論才是正確的選擇。

歡迎追蹤IG: @alcoholneal 來認識更多酒吧
EN:
Crimson beer bars specializing in manufacturers around the world!Okay I am a person who is easy to get drunk when drinking beer, so in fact, I am not going to drink beer, but to eat the curry rice inside. From this price, it is really super delicious!140 yuan, eat delicious curry rice late at night!And this curry rice comes from a bartender. She is very young, personalized, hobbly challenging. She is a very handsome and cool girl, but let's talk about it, she is married!There are many tattoos on her, and there are many stories. Among them, I want to propose a interesting phenomenon in public opinion in public opinion. I do n’t know when it starts, Taiwan generally has a habit: follow the trend.Most people will conclude that they can conclude or condemn the victims according to their superficial stories or one -sided follow -up behavior, but is this right?Many victims are actually the victims, and the victims are just unbearable counterattacks.There are also many victims who have told the victims in advance that they will do their behavior in the future, and the victims still need to be comforted whether the victims are injured regardless of their own safely?I personally think that the choice I do is to be responsible for myself to be the real adult. If the child is mentally psychologically, I should not be in contact at the beginning. In addition, public opinion is another real victim. Therefore, it is necessary to fully understand the beginning and end of the matter and after motivation.

Welcome to track: @alcoholneal to get to know more bars
